content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The structure consists of two main sections:
1. Left section: An archway/gate-like structure with columns
2. Right section: A building-like structure with panels

Total blocks: Approximately 19 distinct blocks
Layers: The structure has multiple layers with blocks placed both vertically and horizontally

## Spatial Relationships
### Left Section (Archway Structure):
- Has a red arch (block #2) at the top
- Supported by two orange cylindrical pillars (block #11)
- Has green rectangular blocks (block #8) on the left and right sides
- Orange triangular blocks (blocks #13, #14, #15, #16) are positioned in various places including on top of the arch and near the base
- A small half-circular red piece appears to be at the bottom of the arch

### Right Section (Building Structure):
- Has vertical green rectangular blocks (block #8) serving as pillars/supports
- Contains yellow horizontal blocks (blocks #9 or #10) at the top and bottom
- Has a red square panel (block #5) and a blue square panel (block #4) inside the structure

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, these are the blocks needed:
- Block #2: Red arch (1 piece)
- Block #4: Blue cube (1 piece)
- Block #5: Red cube (1 piece)
- Block #7: Green horizontal rectangle (1 piece)
- Block #8: Green vertical rectangle (4 pieces)
- Block #9/#10: Yellow horizontal rectangle (3 pieces)
- Block #11: Orange cylinder (2 pieces)
- Block #13/#14/#15/#16: Orange triangular blocks (4 pieces, possibly using different orientations)

# Assembly Order

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 7
  Step2: Move block with index 8
  Step3: Move block with index 8
  Step4: Move block with index 9
  Step5: Move block with index 9
  Step6: Move block with index 5
  Step7: Move block with index 4
  Step8: Move block with index 10
  Step9: Move block with index 8
  Step10: Move block with index 8
  Step11: Move block with index 11
  Step12: Move block with index 11
  Step13: Move block with index 2
  Step14: Move block with index 13
  Step15: Move block with index 15
  Step16: Move block with index 14
  Step17: Move block with index 16
}
```

The assembly begins with the right structure (building) by placing the foundation, then the pillars, panels, and top. Then we move to constructing the left structure (archway) with its pillars, arch, and decorative triangular pieces.
